thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Andrew Meldrum

author: Andrew Meldrum
title: Andrew Meldrum
text: I’ve been working with Allison, Katherine and the Servcorp Virtual Team at 101 Collins St for nearly 5 years. To say they’re wonderful would be an understatement. No request is ever too much trouble, and you're greeted with a smile and welcoming attitude every day. It makes running my business from 101 Collins a pleasure, and I know the team's professionalism and congeniality rubs off on my clients in a positive way.
